Nov. 19, 2017 D GBBA Own Choice (Section B/C)
GBBA Own Choice (Section B) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest GBBA Own Choice Contest gbba-own-choice-section-b

Best horn section of the day: Chinnor Best euphonium player of the day: Chinnor Best percussion section of the day: Bream
Fourth section prizes: John Jones Memorial Trophy for Best Section: Trombones (Malvern Hills) Best test piece: Malvern Hills Winning conductor: Chris Licence (Malvern Hills)
